TopicTitle: Stuck in Space and Death on the mun artwork

Articles.Content:
Heres some art i have made. The first is just a kerbal stranded in space with no rope and the second, as you can guess. The spaceship crashed and killed a kerbal. Blood is a hint.

I made these in Fresh Paint, which is a app for windows 8. Stupidly i had to use a mouse as i dont have a touchscreen, nor do i have a pen and pad thingy.
Dat bit of blood under the fuel tank
Never though about it but kerbals are green. So should it be green blood? Radioactive lol
